price: 33. Ir Allahas nebaustų jų tol, kol tu (Muchammedai ﷺ) esi tarp jų, nei Jis baus juos, kol jie prašys (Allaho) Atleidimo.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
